description: Source code for the BookDetailsScreen widget in a Flutter app, which displays detailed information about a specific book including image, title, author, rating, categories, and an 'Add to Cart' button.

classes.name: BookDetailsScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders details of a book identified by its id, fetched from sample data, and provides UI elements to display book attributes and an action button.

methods.name: _find
methods.description: Retrieves the book with the matching id from sampleBooks; returns null if not found.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the book details page, displaying the book's image, title, author, rating, categories, and an 'Add to Cart' button.
